attributes.action: Stop allowing non uk citizens to get free treatment on the nhs
attributes.additional_details:
The following Article on this:

http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-2217011/GPs-treat-foreigners-new-guidelines.html#comments

Stop the abuse of the nhs by the government ensure that as a visa requirement to enter the uk that the person has health insurance or the ability to pay. If the person wont pay and attempts to get free nhs treatment the person is arrested for fraud and theft.
